Pixel

public Pixel(short r,
             short g,
             short b)
Creates a new Pixel with the specified color.

Parameters:
r - the value for the red Color. The allowed range is between 0 and 255.
g - the value for the green Color. The allowed range is between 0 and 255.
b - the value for the blue Color. The allowed range is between 0 and 255.

Pixel

public Pixel(short r,
             short g,
             short b,
             short a)
Creates a new Pixel with the specified color.

Parameters:
r - the value for the red Color. The allowed range is between 0 and 255.
g - the value for the green Color. The allowed range is between 0 and 255.
b - the value for the blue Color. The allowed range is between 0 and 255.
a - the value for the transparency. The allowed range is between 0 and 100
